text: Fasanerieallee is an alley in Tiergarten in Berlin, Germany. It is primarily known for the many sculptures from the Wilhelmine period. Fasanerieallee is connected to Großer Stern. == Sculpture == {| class="wikitable sortable" ! data-sort-type="text" | Name !! Bildhauer !! Bild |- | Eberjagd um 1500 || Karl Begas || 200px |- | Churfürstliche Fuchsjagd || Wilhelm Haverkamp || 200px |- | Hasenhatz zur Rokokozeit || Max Baumbach || 200px |- | Altgermanische Wisentjagd || Fritz Schaper ||200px |} == External links == * Category:Streets in Berlin Category:Tiergarten (park)
title: Fasanerieallee
